Hi Laurent,

I love MVVM Light, and have enjoyed using it on several mid sized projects...
I've always wished that it was as simple to use Data Annotation in WPF, as it is in ASP.NET.
As of .Net 4.5 INotifyDataErrorInfo has been added for WPF, and I thought how wonderful would it be if MVVM Light had this baked in. I found the following article and it seems the implementation would be fairly simple.

However, I do understand that this framework is called MVVM Light for a reason, and this may not truly fit in with the spirit of your framework.

http://anthymecaillard.wordpress.com/2012/03/26/wpf-4-5-validation-asynchrone/

Thanks
Don W.

Don,

Thanks for the link.

I'd agree it would be nice to add.
